backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining program, KPI, team, and agenda types with comparison utilities and embedded authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing features, themes, and component behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme token definitions using OKLCH values for light and dark modes with SHQ navy/green palette.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML root template loading the React application entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app wrapper handling auth flow, theme provider, loading state, profile setup, and dashboard rendering.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard metrics and charts component computing program/KPI stats and rendering visualizations.
frontend/src/components/DeleteConfirmDia: Reusable delete confirmation dialog using AlertDialog components with Cancel/Delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with SHQ styling, dynamic year, and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo, theme toggle, and user menu with profile and logout options.
frontend/src/components/KpiFormDialog.ts: Dialog form for creating or editing a KPI, handling form state and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/KPIsTab.tsx: KPI management interface with filtering, listing, and edit/delete actions based on user role.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and role before accessing the app.
frontend/src/components/program-calendar: Shows a legend of calendar categories with color indicators for programs, agenda, and KPI deadlines.
Defines category colors and computes per-day counts for programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines.
Provides an error boundary for the calendar tab with a reset option and fallback UI.
Renders a calendar day cell showing date, visual indicators for category counts, and responsive layout.
Displays a side or bottom sheet listing programs occurring on a selected day with click handling.
Offers controls to switch between compact and comfortable calendar grid spacing.
Provides buttons to switch calendar view modes such as month, week, day, or agenda.
Shows detailed program information in a drawer with optional edit actions.
Provides filtering utilities for programs and counts programs active on a specific day using safe date checks.
Maps program status and priority values to display configs including labels, variants, and CSS classes.
Builds a 14‑day agenda list grouping programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines by day and rendering them with status and priority indicators.
Displays all programs, agenda items, and KPIs for a single day with badges and detailed program info.
Renders a month grid calendar and computes daily counts of programs, agenda items, and KPIs for each date cell.
Shows a week‑grid calendar view with per‑day category counts and clickable day cells.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCalendarT: Main calendar UI for viewing, filtering, and managing programs with multiple view modes and reminders.
Error boundary wrapper that catches calendar errors and provides a retry mechanism with query invalidation.
frontend/src/components/ProgramFormDialo: Dialog form for creating or editing a program, handling form state, validation, and mutation submissions.
frontend/src/components/programs/Program: Card component displaying program details, priority/status badges, and edit/delete actions with click‑to‑view behavior.
frontend/src/components/ProgramsTab.tsx: Programs listing tab with search, filtering, sorting, and CRUD actions including form and detail dialogs.
frontend/src/components/RelatedProgramCo: Popover combobox for selecting a related program from a searchable list.
frontend/src/components/ReportsTab.tsx: Reports interface for filtering programs/KPIs and exporting data to CSV.
frontend/src/components/team/ManagerSele: Dropdown selector for choosing a manager, excluding the current member and supporting a 'no manager' option.
frontend/src/components/team/PhotoUrlPre: Previews a user photo from a URL, handling loading states and errors with avatar fallback and indicators.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamFunctio: Clickable member node showing avatar, initials fallback, and basic info, highlighting selection state.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberC: Card component showing a team member with avatar upload support, edit/delete callbacks, and mutation-based avatar updates.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamMemberD: Side panel displaying detailed info about a team member, including manager and direct reports.
frontend/src/components/team/TeamStructu: Recursive component rendering a hierarchical org-chart node with avatar, role, and child connectors.
Builds and displays the functional team structure with hierarchy warnings and a details panel for selected members.
frontend/src/components/TeamMemberFormDi: Dialog form for creating or editing team members, including avatar upload and validation.
frontend/src/components/TeamMembersTab.t: Team members management tab with filtering, card/structure views, and create/edit/delete actions.
frontend/src/components/TopPillNav.tsx: Renders a top pill-style navigation bar with tabs, including an additional Users tab for admins.
Displays and manages user profiles with role editing, restricted to admins with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
Interval-based reminder system triggering toast notifications for upcoming programs, agenda items, and KPI deadlines.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity React context and provider using Dfinity AuthClient, handling login, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Provides a hook that listens to a CSS media query and returns whether it currently matches.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, programs, KPIs, and admin checks via an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes, including gradients and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app using QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the dashboard with tabs for programs, KPIs, reports, and admin-only user profiles, using layout components and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login card allowing users to authenticate via Internet Identity with loading feedback.
frontend/src/utils/imageNormalize.ts: Provides an image normalization utility that resizes, compresses, validates, and converts images before upload, rejecting unsupported formats.
frontend/src/utils/imageUpload.ts: Handles client-side image normalization and uploads using ImgBB or Imgur with fallbacks and progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/reminderDedup.ts: Tracks shown reminders in localStorage with expiry-based deduping and utilities to mark or check reminders.
frontend/src/utils/safeBrowserStorage.ts: Provides safe wrappers around localStorage operations with JSON and string helpers and fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/teamFunctionalStructu: Collects hierarchy members, groups them by division, and offers non-mutating name sorting utilities.
frontend/src/utils/teamHierarchy.ts: Builds a team hierarchy tree, detecting orphans, cycles, and invalid manager references with warnings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Extracts, stores, retrieves, and clears URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/urlValidation.ts: Validates general HTTP/HTTPS URLs and HTTPS-only URLs using URL parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state including UI theming updates, detailed calendar UI requirements, known issues with dropdowns, scrolling, and photo uploads, and a list of existing features. Serves as a versioned specification and issue log for ongoing development.
